item.title: Artificial intelligence, environment and ethics
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: Round table on integrating intelligence into your business while respecting your own environmental and ethical values at the Swiss IT forum(s) 2024 held on 26 and 27 September at Palexpo (Geneva)

item.title: CircularIT demo - MIKUJY
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: Demonstration of CircularIT by Ivan Mariblanca Flinch at the Swiss IT forum(s) 2024 held on 26 and 27 September at Palexpo (Geneva)

item.title: Decarbonising your value chain
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: Round table on decarbonising your value chain: what digital solutions can you use to measure, reduce and facilitate your extra-financial reporting? at the Swiss IT forum(s) 2024 held on 26 and 27 September at Palexpo (Geneva)

item.title: Digital collage workshop - Resilio
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: Digital collage workshop by Celine Carle-Faye at the Swiss IT forum(s) 2024 held on 26 and 27 September at Palexpo (Geneva)

item.title: Reconciling Innovation and Sustainability
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: Conference by Collaboration Betters The World on reducing the environmental impact of your projects: what strategies can you use to reconcile innovation and sustainability? at the Swiss IT forum(s) 2024 held on 26 and 27 September at Palexpo (Geneva)

item.title: Resilio tech demonstration - Resilio
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: Demonstration of Resilio Tech by Amael Parreaux-Ey at the Swiss IT forum(s) 2024 held on 26 and 27 September at Palexpo (Geneva)

item.title: The CSR impact of digital in practice
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: Conference by Verdikt on the CSR impact of digital in practice at the Swiss IT forum(s) 2024 held on 26 and 27 September at Palexpo (Geneva)

item.title: Strategize
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: Roman Pichler’s book Strategize details an extremely effective approach to digital product management.

item.title: Team topologies
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: The book Team topologies by Matthew Skelton and Manuel Pais details an approach based on the inversion of Conway’s Law to accelerate the value delivery of technology organisations.

item.title: GreenIT.fr association
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: Green IT is the association that brings together the experts behind the digital sustainability, responsible digital, eco-design of digital services and slow.tech approaches.

item.title: Software environmental impact
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: Software, although virtual, has a real environmental impact. The proliferation of bloatware is adding to the carbon footprint of digital technology. Software eco-design is the key to a more sustainable future.

item.title: Agile tour Lausanne 2022 - Who said we lacked energy?
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: Lessons learned on the bottom-up approach implemented to initiate the transition from a project-oriented to a product-oriented organisation.

item.title: Agile tour Lyon 2022 - Towards endless euphoria
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: Lessons learned on the creation of a product team within a company historically organised to carry out projects.

item.title: About me
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: Agile coach, digital product management specialist, fervent advocate of sustainable development.

item.title: Resume
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: My professional background is in digital software development, Agile coaching and sustainable development consulting.
